title: What Next TBD: I Bought It. Why Can't I Fix It?
description:
Whether it’s a phone screen or a coffee machine, why is it so hard to fix our own stuff? And what can we do to make it a bit easier?

Guest: Jason Koebler, editor-in-chief of Motherboard and contributor to the CYBER podcast

Host
Lizzie O’Leary
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:title: What Next TBD: I Bought It. Why Can't I Fix It?
itunes:author: Slate Podcasts
itunes:subtitle: Manufacturers don’t let customers repair their own stuff. That may be about to change.
